comment.author: 38896199@N06
comment._content: NLI, who took this photo or do you have this info?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/int0lerant] As far as we know, it was any one of a stable of Irish Independent newspaper photographers. Sometimes names of well-known photographers or their initials were printed alongside the captions, and so identified who took individual photos in our Independent Newspapers Collection. However I searched 1923 issues of that newspaper, but couldn't find any evidence that this photo was ever printed in the paper. Often happened - 100s of photos taken, but only a fraction were ever printed... Short answer, no! :(
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
